title: Bronco busters
creator_credit: Laurence Hyde and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Scenes of cowboys at the Calgary Stampede roping and riding wild horses captured from the ranges of Southern Alberta, Canada. The film also shows roping a calf, bull-dogging a steer, riding a bull, and a chuck-wagon race.
